(Help Label 1)These are a list of common FAQ's that relate to troubleshooting on the device
(help Label 2)If none of these answers help with your problem, please contact us on our helpline number or via email.

(Activation Message)This Device needs to be activated
(Distance to Nearest Label)Distance to nearest point:
(Unit of Measurement Label)Select which unit of measurement you would prefer

(Lost GPS signal Title)Sorry, we have lost GPS signal. Please carry on with the tour as it does not affect the audio tour.
(Activation Lable)Please use one of the two methods to input your PIN and CODE
(Online Gps Signal label)(The Device has a GPS signal)
(Offline Gps Signal label)(The Device does not have a GPS signal)
(No Network Label)Sorry, there is no WiFi network to connect to. Please try again or use the offline option.
(Invalid Pin/Code Label)Sorry, you have entered an incorrect PIN or CODE.\n Please try again. \n If the problem persists, please contact our helpline.
